籤詩版本二:
Shiga da fita daga cikin sansanin don neman wadata mai yawa, kamar jaki mara lahani da ke ɓoye a cikin dutse
Idan kana da mutum mai daraja da zai jagorance ka, za a albarkace ka da dukiya da kyawawan wurare a wannan lokacin.
詩意:
Wannan dutse hexagram yana wakiltar dukiyar da ke cikinsa.
Komai yana tafiya lafiya.
解曰: Kamar dutsen boye ja. Umarnin mai daraja kawai gamsarwa ce. Farin ciki da alfahari.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Sarkin sarakuna Yang ya dubi Qiongua
Viburnum yana fure sau ɗaya a shekara, da maraice. Sarkin sarakuna Yang na daular Sui ya ji wani yana cewa furen Qiongua a Yangzhou ba shi da misaltuwa a duniya, fari kamar jadi ne, kyakkyawa, mai laushi da kyan gani. Daukar kuyangar sarki a kan wani jirgin ruwan dodanniya, suka je Yangzhou domin jin dadin furannin da ke cike da kayatarwa, dauke da tutoci.
(Ma'anar wannan labarin shine abubuwa suna da daraja kamar wannan "Qiongua" idan bai bayyana ba, ba zai zama komai ba, idan ya faru, zai ba ku mamaki).
聖意: Gidan alheri ne, kai ya wadata, ciniki ya yi nasara, a yi aure, an haifi namiji a Liujia, a motsa mai tafiya, a motsa tsutsotsi, a karkatar da tsutsotsi a kan dabbobi shida, a gano yadda ake gudanar da himma. , an ci nasara a kara, dukiyar da aka bata ta alheri ce, cutar Anshan, kabari mai albarka.
